website_summaries.verdict: The best choice if you're looking for a good deal – 2 chairs that cost less than some single models.
pros: Offers 2 well-made chairs at a value price
Provides the same features as more costly models, plus convenient sunshades
cons: Difficult to fold with cupholders in place

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs but are seconds
customer_reviews.text: I really like these chairs but note that both were incorrectly assembled. One has the right side locking device installed on the inside of the arm. The other has a missing rivet on the foot guard. I would call these factory seconds, new but with defects
customer_reviews.author: Trombone Rick

customer_reviews.title: Rusted and Corroded
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the package. All the bolts in the chairs are rusty and corroded. On the bottom the metal bar is completely rusted.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: no spare parts, i guess stupid is as stupid does
customer_reviews.text: once you do damage to this chair thats it you need to replace the whole thing.. here is the response I got back inquiring about a screw---We are more than happy to sell you screws, however, all of our items are sold as a full unit and we are unable to provide individual spare parts due to no available stocks from the manufacturer. What we can suggest you may try to check to your nearest local store. For additional questions, comments, or concerns, please feel free to visit our help [e-mail address removed]. Our team is available 7 days a week to help. Thank you for choosing BestChoiceProducts and have a wonderful day! Sincerely, Darlene‍ ‍
customer_reviews.author: sumi'e painter

customer_reviews.title: Neither chair will lock in place. Both are unstable and easily fall backwards
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get these chairs because the color is beautiful. We sat in the chair, leaned back, cautiously and cranked the screw to lock the legs in place and within 3o seconds, both chairs refolded to original position. We tried everything to get the chairs to lock so we could actually use them and both failed. They are also unstable, as I was trying to hold myself in place with I tinkered with the cranked, the chair tumbled backwards, I hadn't extended to full extension at the time so I was surprised at the instability. I have reached out to the seller in hopes they will provider return shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Fit Hot MEss

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the Price
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice chairs and of decent quality. I've seen higher end chairs, but this is fine for the price. It is designed for normal sized folks... it's not extra wide if you are "fluffy" in size. The little side cup holder thing is super annoying to put on... sometimes I think about throwing it in the fire pit... but it's plastic so I don't.
customer_reviews.author: Luveurope

customer_reviews.title: Awesome at first...
customer_reviews.text: We loved these at first. Even got family members to order multiple sets. Unfortunately the black ones just broke- the arms snapped completely apart. And the tan ones held water and when we moved them they spilled out a ton of black water. And it's stain the crap out of my patio. Its been like 5 weeks since we got them. Kind of disappointing. But they were super comfy for that first month.
customer_reviews.author: Mike F.

customer_reviews.title: Chairs are garbage
customer_reviews.text: After three months material is falling apart as seen in photos. Photos are two separate chairs. Waste of money, very, very disappointed in product. Vender should stand behind there product and replace these chairs.
customer_reviews.author: John Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Small, short, uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product to anyone over 5'10" or 150 lbs. I am 6'2" and 240lbs, these did not work for me at all. They are too small in every dimension: too narrow, too low to the ground, too flimsy, too short. I'm sure for a small person these would be tolerable, but the build quality is just not where it needs to be. This isn't a good value: spend twice as much to get one chair that is built well and is a suitable size.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Finson

customer_reviews.title: Worst chairs ever don't buy
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are the worst. I bought the double set less than 24 hrs after purchase the first chair broke. Screws pop out. The 2nd chair has another screw missing. I thought they were a decent price and would last longer than they did. I don't recommend these chairs at all. Less than 6 months and both these chairs are dangerously useless waste of money DONT BUY THESE CHAIRS . THE BOX IS BULKY FOR RETURNS TOO NOT WORTH IT
customer_reviews.author: nmccray

customer_reviews.title: Beware: They will Rust!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these chairs May 2019. I loved them when I first received them, even though being a 5’9” female, my feet go pass the bar at bottom a bit. However, I am completely disappointed with this purchase now. I ordered the black chairs and they are rusting through everywhere on the chair! They have been on my screened-in balcony and still rusting!! Total waste of money!!! Very, very disappointed!! I don’t expect to buy outside chairs that need to be replaced every year!!
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Pick THIS one, you'll be glad you did!
customer_reviews.text: great great great!!! I spent at least an HOUR comparing different outdoor chairs and loungers... (lots to choose from, thank you Amazon!) I finally chose this one and i'm glad I did! 1. i love the blue color 2. very comfortable 3. quality design (i love the side cupholder) 4. NO assembly required 5. heavy duty -- solid construction 6. very affordable and it came '2' chair for $70
customer_reviews.author: B. Pennell

customer_reviews.title: These chairs are worth every penny I paid for them!
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable and fold up nice and compact. The cup holders are a great addition, I only wish they were part of the physical chair instead of a separate piece that has to be taken off to fold up My husband is 6' 250lb and also thinks the chair is comfortable and feels nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and easy to move! I am 5’8” 160lbs my boyfriend is 6’4” 250lbs and they worked great! They fold up easily. There is a handle on the side to try to lock in your position. So if you lean back to 45 degrees it will hold you there. The handle isn’t perfect and it’ll go lose after a while but it’s easy to reset. I think they’re great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Avery Roy

customer_reviews.title: Very good deal .
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I have against this package is that It was to have a leaflet about maintaining the chairs, but it was missing. Otherwise I knew what to expect since I used to have such chairs before. It is not very easy to adjust them for sure. But the price and free delivery made it a better deal than I could find at Walmart, Home Depot or Lowe’s. So I recommend this zero gravity chair for patio or garden use. Of course they could be set up in a family room if there is enough room there . The chairs seem to be sturdy and should last long if not left outside in bad weather.
customer_reviews.author: Zoltan Janosi

customer_reviews.title: Do not take to the beach!!!
customer_reviews.text: I initially loved these chairs. Have had them for a week and was really looking forward to taking them to the beach. Worked out great there but after two days, the chairs are rusted bad! There is rust growing on every weld,what a shame. Do not take these to the beach!!!!! Pictures are after I sprayed with rust penetrant, no luck
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Portable
customer_reviews.text: Oh my word! So comfortable, portable, seemingly durable. An excellent find for enjoying the outdoors in comfort. I like that they fold up and can be stored away in unfavorable conditions. Being able to store them out of the elements should help them last a little longer than our cheap, plastic chairs. Oh, and the beverage/sundry tray is a nice bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Genia

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap poorly made product!
customer_reviews.text: Poorly manufactured products! Already came with broken handles. And the paint was already peeling off! I have similar product from different company and the quality of this product is horrible! With similar price of my good quality product! Don't buy! Plus it took them almost 2 months to give me my money back after I made several phone call!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Beth Novak

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, no rust, plan to buy another set
customer_reviews.text: I got this type of chair from Costco and decided to try these as well from Amazon. The Costco chair is a sturdier and feels like it would hold up better over the years, but these chairs are more comfortable (for me) than the Costco chair. Mainly, the pillow is more comfortable, though the mesh feels cheaper and not as stuff as the Costco chair, which actually makes it more comfortable for me. These have been rained on a lot over the last few weeks that I've had them, but so far I don't see any signs of rusting. Not sure if they will hold up to salt water and sand at the beach, but we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Z

customer_reviews.title: Poor stitching
customer_reviews.text: Pillow came off when I pulled it out of the beat up box. The stitching on pillow wasn't completed which didn't allow it to connect to the strap and leaves foam exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Wass

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these chairs to because they can fold up and be stored away (I live in an small, old house w/no closets or storage inside or out). I wanted something that could be used outside in my yard, but found these to be just as useful inside as extra seating. I am very pleased with these chairs. Love that they have the side table attached, makes it nice when guests can't reach a table. I can fold these up and easily store behind my dresser, they are outta sight, and easy to grab when needed. Very comfy and sturdy, and easy to wipe down after use outside to be stored inside.
customer_reviews.author: RachelTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: Rusted after ONE day in rain
customer_reviews.text: One day in the rain and there is rust residue coming off all the joints to this chair including where the elastic to the fabric holds onto the chair. Very disappointed. In addition to that the boxes this was delivered in was ripped apart on the bottom and poorly taped. Upon inspection the chairs were clearly a return because the bottoms were scraped up as if they were used on concrete of some kind.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME (except one tiny click-baity thing)
customer_reviews.text: If you enjoy sitting, this is going to be your jam. There’s a spot for your butt, a spot for your back, TWO spots for your arms, and they most def didn’t forget about dem legz. Folding? Check. Cup holder for a glass of pure vodka from the mother land? Check (in Russian) Pillow for dat sexy skull of yours? Yeah, of course. Only issue is that, in order to hold you in position when reclining, you twist these twisty knobs. When it’s warm, they naturally come undone...meaning you won’t really be held in that comfy af position you started in. So, if you’re in the Arctic, no problem. If not...it’s a minor, minor issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: These are really nice chairs for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice chairs for the price. They are not quite as wide as the chair the zero gravity chair that we already have, but we paid $89 for it and it didn't have the tray and it was a single. Just can't believe the price! We've had them for over a month now and we really enjoy them, although I have to admit, my dogs enjoy them a lot more then we do. Every time I get home there is one in each of them, so I KNOW they are the most comfortable spot on the porch, lol! :)
customer_reviews.author: BestsontheroadTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price...
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are super comfy and easy to unfold and setup. I love that it has a neck pillow that is also very easy to adjust while sitting down. My only two complaints; 1. I wish the chair was a little longer. I'm 5'7 with long legs and I feel a bit too long. 2. In shipment the chairs rubbed through the paint in a few sections and that is now rusting. So I now have to sand down and refinish those areas. Looking for cheaper chairs, these are great! Not looking for a headache in a month or two? Spend a little more money for something else
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Shipping box was trashed
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was a good deal. As I am writing this review I literally just got the chairs and as the title says the box they came in was trashed. I pull the first chair out and it was fine so I got excited but when I pulled the second chair out the box I could immediately feel that one of the locking knobs was broken but I still felt it would work but it does not. It won’t stay in position. Like I said I just got these chairs and I’ve sent a message to the company so I’m hoping they will stand behind their business which will change my opinion. We will see.
customer_reviews.author: Bigtone

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great chairs. Look exactly like the photos. Just as bright. The cup holder attachment is removable and easy to put right back on. The color has not faded in 2 years. The first year, I made sure to keep them out of the rain and snow. They still looked new taking them out in the Spring. The second year I neglected them a little and there is a small amount of rust now. I would say they’re pretty hardy considering! If you take care of them, I don’t see having any issues. Fold them and keep them out of the rain and snow. The reclining feature is really nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I agree with BONES review 7-12-17  "NOT GOOD"
customer_reviews.text: I have to agree with the BONES review updated on 7-12-17 ... these chairs are "NOT GOOD" from the aesthetic point of view. Chairs got rained on and RUSTED ... OVER NIGHT ... EVERY spot there is a weld ... and there are a LOT of welds. I can't imagine there is any paint or coating on theses chairs. Very disappointing. This chair is just going to be maintenance to keep them looking good ... not the pull up a chair and relax type I would have expected from an Amazon "BEST CHOICE". Shaking my head in disbelief of poor product manufacturing,
customer_reviews.author: silent

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable but rust spots after only a couple of days.
customer_reviews.text: These things are so darn comfortable! They quickly turned into our favorite patio/pool chairs for the rest of the season. I was a bit bummed out by rust starting to form after just a few days. As a seasoned DIY-er, it won't be a big deal for me at some future point to sand off and refinish, but for those of you out there not looking for that, beware. For the price, I'm also not really surprised, either (not that something more expensive wouldn't do the exact same thing because it is 2018 and there's a lot of junk out there).
customer_reviews.author: Lou P.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for 2–pretty cool chairs!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are great! I got the blue color. The chairs were already assembled and the drink holders were included. I may tighten the screws but no assembly. No complaints here. At $104 for 2 chairs, this is a great deal. They’re not tiny chairs or anything, just normal and comfortable. I’m around 190 and didn’t feel snug in the chair at all.
customer_reviews.author: Spyke

customer_reviews.title: definitely yes
customer_reviews.text: After reading hundreds of reviews from many different sites this set of gravity chairs seemed the best. When they came I tried them out immediately and found them true to the specifications that were listed. I feel so comfortable in them and they are very easy to use. I am a senior and have no problems getting in or out of them. The chair fits all from short to tall. Best Choice, a great company.
customer_reviews.author: anne

customer_reviews.title: Chairs rusted.
customer_reviews.text: The chairs started rusting after the first rain. I had them folded up under the eaves of my house not in direct rain. There was rust on several "joints" and rails. The chairs are very comfortable but the rust is unacceptable. I have had houseguests since and have been unable to complain or return. I hope I am not too late. I am very disappointed. Hardly my "Best Choice"
customer_reviews.author: Mystic Mom

customer_reviews.title: Weak and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Sat down just now and legs bent. Now the chair is a recliner forever. I am 195 lbs, not tiny but not enough to break metal. I'm also not strong but I was able to bend the legs somewhat back again, though when I sat down it once again collapsed. I dont know what this is made of, but no decent product should collapse and be hand-bendable within four months of purchase. Edit: on closer inspection, leg joints had rust. I tried to bend them back into shape and it broke off. Complete waste of money. Bought in February; this is ludicrous.
customer_reviews.author: Somebody who thinks you should take my opinion with a grain of salt

customer_reviews.title: Pinch hazard and Foot Bar Discomfort.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for the most part, but my 6'2" husbands legs extend out past the foot bar and his lower leg rests on the metal bar, not comfortable there. A pool noodle on the bar or a small long pillow will help. Biggest issue is that under the arms of, in the folding mechanism, there is a severe pinch hazard. The chair should have a protective cover to keep your fingers from being pinch. We both experienced this within a few minutes of trying the chairs out for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Vhuber101

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these two lounge chairs. I like that it came as a pair and the price compared to other places I have looked at is Awesome. The quality of the chair is good. It is very comfortable. I had debated buying chaise cushions but it is comfortable enough without them. The color is pretty. When I ordered, it was suppose to be delivered at a future date that I was disappointed about but I didn't have to wait long after all. I would highly recommend these and would buy again if I need more.
customer_reviews.author: DesDH

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice and when I am in a semi reclining position ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if mine are defective or not cause they never sit upright nor does the front bar touch the ground so I am always scrambling to get out of the chair. It looks nice and when I am in a semi reclining position it is fine. But getting out of the chair is not fun and most awkward. When they said zero gravity I didn''t know they meant they were always up in the air. I find it difficult to return stuff to Amazon, so I will keep them, but would not recommend them nor buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Janeen W.

customer_reviews.title: Not for short people. Not for tall people.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product. But after seeing friends’ zero gravity chairs I realized that this one falls short in a couple areas. My biggest complaint is that even in locked mode, the chair creeps down. I tighten it as much as it goes but it never stays put. In addition, other chairs recline easily as soon as you push back. This one does not. You have to keep one foot on the ground and push off. So if you’re short, good luck. My feet also hang off the bar. Totally uncomfortable. So if you’re 5’9” and above, good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! I am a hefty guy and these hold ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I am a hefty guy and these hold me up even after several cocktails! I'd buy em again
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Better off buying something else.
customer_reviews.text: The wife and I were able to get one summer out of these chairs. We have a covered patio so it's not like they were left out in the elements. Come winter there were stored in the garage. We got them back out for the next summer and when we sat down we noticed the material was deteriorating. The material and eyelids started coming apart, and the crods holding it all together broke on one chair. So if you're looking for a cheap chair that gets one Summer's use this is the chair for you. You get what you pay for, buyers beware.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: BEST LOUNGE CHAIRS!!! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: What a steal!!! I hit a sale on these: $80 for 2! And WHOA these are awesome!!! Absolutely so setup required except to pop on the little side table. Comfortable, stylish, easy to fold and store, side table is a major plus for holding phone/tablet and drink (biggest bonus: the cup holder fits a wine glass just perfectly). I’ve recommended these chairs to everyone I know and have received a lot of compliments on them! WONDERFUL chairs!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lukasiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Dryrot, broken rotting laces, reclining knob doesn't lock in place.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in the summer of 2015. Its spring of 2018 and they are no longer around. The first summer I noticed at almost every weld, there was rust. The bar under the thighs cut into my legs just enough to bug me...super uncomfortable. The elastic for the headrest dryrotted before the fall came in 2015. The adjustment knob never stayed tight enough to keep you reclined for more than 2 minutes...no exaggeration. It slowly... sat... you... up...as it untightened on it's own. Aggravating. 2016 came and went, same problems. 2017, in the Fall, the laces were breaking from dryrot. In the garbage they went.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Geney

customer_reviews.title: Economical, but maybe rusting after 1 week?
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Overall design is very comfortable. These are a little more narrow than ones we’ve had previously that were the similar style. The one downside... And it could be a major downside... Is that we’re starting to see some rust evidence after only a week of having them. It doesn’t appear to be rusting on the actual outer frame? It almost seems like maybe it’s from where the seat connects to frame? Not really sure. We will see rust colored droplets in various places around the chair. And after a rain if you pick it up and move it the water that drains from it is rust colored. Will have to keep an eye on longevity?
customer_reviews.author: bookworm

customer_reviews.title: small, average quality, not zero gravity
customer_reviews.text: Small - my 6' son looks like he's sitting in a child's chair. Overall quality doesn't seem great, and even at what amounts to $60 or so each, it's not worth that. Not comfortable, and NOT zero gravity. It's more of a recliner, and does not tip back nearly as far as an actual zero gravity chair. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Educated Consumer

customer_reviews.title: The quality isn't that great and don't feel very sturdy but they get the ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these chairs are alright. The quality isn't that great and don't feel very sturdy but they get the job done and the price can't be beat. The material is breathable and the attachable tables are handy to have. They are relatively light when you want to carry them around as well. I plan on keeping them out of the sun/rain when not in use and expect for them to last one or two summers max.
customer_reviews.author: JC182

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: I guess it's okay for the price but would have put my money towards something better. One use at the beach and about a couple weeks later and never touching water...I pulled them out to use and they were rusted. I opened it to sit at home and a huge screw on the arm fell out and not the other part of the arm is breaking off...Won't last for much longer..def not to keep folding and opening back up.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Trigila

customer_reviews.title: RUST-Trust the rust reviews!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have thought to look for reviews regarding rust. Lesson learned. They claim to be, "designed to last outdoors," but so far they have rusted where the loops hold the strings for the "fabric" you sit/lay on and a few other spots. If your chairs are going to get wet in any way shape or form, I DON'T RECOMMEND these chairs . The fabric has held up it's color, but what is the point of that when the metal is turning to rust? Purchased in Nov 2019 and just noticed the rust in March 2020 (TN winter).
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Day Clark

customer_reviews.title: Cup holder Broke within 2 weeks/drains rust
customer_reviews.text: Both cup holders broke within 2 uses. The part snapped easily. The chair also drains a rust if rained on or gets wet which has stained my deck treks. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST CHOICE?? MORE LIKE WORST CHOICE!! (Unless you like rusty chairs that is...)
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these in early September and within 2 weeks they were showing signs of rust. Mind you we don't live in a salty area or even have a pool. Previously we had 2 from Walmart that lasted 6 years without rusting! Please take a look at the pictures and see for yourself. I am posting this to save others from the same trouble we went through in returning them. PLEASE NOTE: While return shipping was free, you need to supply your own box which Fedex wanted to charge us $25. Whichever brand you buy do yourself a favor and SAVE THE BOX at least through the warranty period. Let me know if this was helpful. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: honest reviewer guy

customer_reviews.title: Nice to look at, locking mechanism does not work, rust
customer_reviews.text: Chairs are very pleasing to the eye. Arrived quickly and fully assembled. However, the locking mechanism does not work, it is hard to push yourself back to a comfortable possible but once you make it the chair will not lock, so you will slowly slide back to a fully sitting position. To add to this I tried the chairs for 2 days, on the second day one of them was already rusting. That's when I decided they needed to go back and returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Piggy Rod

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!! Perfect for our small deck
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable!! Perfect for our small deck .... The price was unbelievable. The chairs feel sturdy and I am hoping we can use them for several years.
customer_reviews.author: nan h

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were going to be noticeably lower quality because of how low the price of these was compared to other zero gravity chairs, but I was pleasantly surprised at how nice these were! Really solid chairs. In fact, whenever we have guests over that use the chairs, the reaction usually is, "wow, these are super comfy. How much were they and where can I get some?"
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rust evident
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are vaguely acceptable comfort wise. I wish someone still made an affordable, multi-adjustable chair such as those vinyl strapped beach chairs they had in the 1970s. They could be adjusted to allow face down, lie flat. But I digress. My main complaint about these chairs is the rust blooming out of the lace holes, even though they are stored in a garage. Seems humidity doesn't agree with the internal frame tubing. Humidity is prevalent in many places these might land and rust isn't a good sign. So many items sold these days are in the "buyer beware" category, these are no exception.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mc.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Fading
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in April and initially liked the chair and tray, even though the tilt mechanism is not as smooth as a more expensive set of similar chairs that I own. I felt these were a 4 star purchase initially due to the price being lower than the higher quality chairs, therefore I bought two additional chairs. I later regretted this because of extreme fading. These chairs have sat side by side and although both faded, one looks much more damaged. The picture shows both shows fading on both and the protected areas of the chair that are closer to the initial price.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Richards

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Believe the bad reviews
customer_reviews.text: I saw mixed reviews and thought the bad ones were a fluke. But the quality was terrible. I didn't know coating on metal could be do cheap. It was worn off in several places and flaking in parts. The only good thing was Amazon's excellent return policy. Returned at no cost to me without any pictures needed.
customer_reviews.author: Songbird

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs! Why so cheap?
customer_reviews.text: These are well made chairs, considering they're half the price of what other friends have paid. The bungee cords holding the mesh fabric in place is doubled, unlike similar ones I've seen. I like the mesh fabric because it's breathable and works well for warm weather. Maybe not good for cold though. The only other difference I can see is that it doesn't recline completely. A friend complained that you can't take a nap in it, but it does recline easily to almost horizontal
customer_reviews.author: Melina

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful....But will rust
customer_reviews.text: I cannot give these chairs enough stars! The color is absolutely beautiful, the burgundy leans toward a raspberry which is just gorgeous. They function smoothly, and the cup holder is priceless. Not only does it hold a cup, but there is a compartment for a phone, book and more. These chairs are a GREAT buy for the money! ❤️ Update: Whoever said these chairs rust quickly was right. We are using a small brush to touch up the offending spots with rust-proof paint as necessary. I still love the chairs but they definitely could have done a better job with the paint.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Freaking awesome! Great quality for the money.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome, I was going to buy one at Costco for 60.00 but then I thought I would try the two of these on amazon. I'm so glad we did. They come with trays. They are so comfortable, my husband is about 200Lbs. I'm 140lbs. They came perfectly packaged. I got them in Navy blue, I would definitely recommend these. Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny's review

customer_reviews.title: Look, don’t use often and be ginger with them.
customer_reviews.text: These chairs we used one time at the beach. One of the two cup holder attachments broke by just pressing it down to secure. Both were only put in sand an not in the ocean. Rinsed everyday and put on deck, but hey still rusted very badly. Last, the turn knobs lock do not work at all! These are just window dressing as they are useless and pointless. If getting this for non-beach use and don’t use often then these should work. If using a lot, caring around, beach use, etc.. then these will not last very long. Look at something else. Very dissatisfied with them.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Excellant for the money
customer_reviews.text: I would have rated this a five if it were not as large as the lounge I replaced with it. Other than that I really like it and am happy I bought the two-pack because one is stored in my garage ready to use when this one calls in a day in many years. While it is smaller - the legroom isn't as long, and the width of the seat is smaller as are the armrests. Those are easy to get used to and soon I have forgotten the differences. I am happy I purchased these chairs these already assembled chairs and the side "table" is great for holding glasses and other items.
customer_reviews.author: Deny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Quarantine Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these chairs for some outdoor comfort since I've been home more due to quarantine. They did come with some minor scratches on the chairs, but nothing major. I'm super happy with the comfort of these chairs, they are easy to fold and unfold, and are fairly light if I want to move them around. Mine did come with the 2 attachable trays, I did see some reviews where people did not receive them. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S

customer_reviews.title: What a shame it rusts because everything else is great.
customer_reviews.text: The chair is lite and very comfortable to sit in however if you actually leave it outside it rusts terribly from the inside of the seat tubing. There is no sign of rust on the outside but since the inside of the open tubes are not painted at all they are completely rusting and the rust is draining out of the inner tubes onto my deck and creating large rust puddles. I wouldn't have expected an exterior chair to rust within a month or so of actually being outside. Not a very happy customer because I'm sure that it will not hold up even through the summer because of the amount of rust coming from the seat tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: If you purchase these the chairs will arrive just like the picture, the color is right on. The chairs seem to be of good quality for the price however the packaging was lacking. My package when delivered was tore and the product had a small scratch on the bottom of the chair. The cup holders look cheap but for the amount of money that 2 chairs cost I believe in this case you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Flaky Biscuit

customer_reviews.title: Nice chairs, delivered slightly damaged
customer_reviews.text: Chairs are great! Very comfortable and they come assembled, which is wonderful. I pulled both chairs out of the box and there are instructions on how to use the chair and add the cup holder to the side of the chair. I love that this was a two pack. However, as shown in my photo, one chair was great- no damage or issue. The other chair had damage to the arm. I’m assuming this is from shipping and they are a bit heavy, 10-15 pounds, so not sure if I want to return. Overall, the chairs are nice, we will see how they hold up with time.
customer_reviews.author: Krista D

customer_reviews.title: Good price, a little small for taller people.
customer_reviews.text: Decent chairs for the price. The leg support was a little short for me, I wish it was longer. I am 6'1" and when I lean back my legs hang out by about 8-10". The locking mechanism could be stronger it is pretty weak and I really have to crank it down to lock it in the reclined position. The side tables are really stable and nice. I like how they are easily removable. Overall satisfied with the product but only because of the lower price point. Next time I will prob spend more for a bigger chair and a better locking mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Brought these camping with friends who each had their own versions. The lower quality compared to higher-end chairs is evident, especially in the locking mechanism and how far back they recline (less far than other chairs). However, we were the only ones with cup holders - which were great and used often by someone in a nicer chair sitting alongside. Given the balance between price, quality and cup holders, I'd make this choice again.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Mr.Ed

customer_reviews.title: Rusted in 2 months!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these and gave them as a gift at the end of June. I almost died when I saw them last week. They are all rusty already. Such a waste of money! They were kept on a barely used pool deck. No salt water. These were a major disappointment. They clearly didn't use the right paint or didn't use a sealant. Because I emailed the seller a week beyond the return date, they were only willing to give me 30% back. They would no longer accept a return. If I had known earlier, these would have been returned. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Greetings. I bought them last year and started using recently and did not last 3 months. Poor quality. My weight = 154 pounds and I use them indoor, inside of my apartment. I bought similar ones at a shop back in 2013 for outdoors with no kind of issues. I contacted the seller and said it has 60 days warranty. I understand that but the point is that is a poor quality product and I'm sure I'm not the only one who has complained about it. If the manufacturer and seller really care about the Customer Satisfaction they should recall for analysis or refund. Sincerely, Othmar Rios
customer_reviews.author: Othmar Rios

customer_reviews.title: Both came damaged!
customer_reviews.text: My chairs came damaged. One of them has a black stain right in the middle of the seat which looks looks grease. Also, the pillow was sewn incorrectly. The brown bobbin thread is on the wrong side of the pillow and is very visible. The arms are both scratched. On the second chair, the bolt cover is cracked and was off and in the box upon removal from the box. The arms on this chair are also scratched. I needed replacements as soon as possible, as they were needed for a party. They will not replace it. I needed to return that first, then reorder them. Not worth the trouble!
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Package is not good but product itself is fine
customer_reviews.text: As you can see from the picture, it banged up quite badly. The problem is that there is only a very thin bubble wrap inside and there are some slight scratch when I got them out. They can do a better by reinforcing the edge with a cardboard piece shaped as a tube to provide more structural stiffness. Overall, the chair itself it good. My child loves it but it a tag too short for me. My leg would be on the bottom metal bar which is not as comfortable as it can be. I am about 5' 10" for your reference. Still a good buy since the fabric is better than I thought. Hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: supra0083

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews of several zero gravity chairs, I was re-thinking buying any of them. I was concerned about the number of stock photos with a chair photoshopped in. If the chair is so comfy, why is no one sitting in it? Do people and chairs not exist together in real life? Why has this chair been invited to a cookout just to sit sad and empty? Maybe I should buy the chairs the people are sitting in and clearly having the time of their lives. Anyway, I picked this and am very happy. They seem a bit shorter than I would have guessed but it fits me fine. We are very glad we got them.
customer_reviews.author: Alison A.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are a good value for their low price, however they are not the most sturdy or the most comfortable. The locking wheels do not work well, and require excessive force in tightening to actually lock the chair from reclining further. The fabric is quite thin, and I often feel the metal supports while sitting in these chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Baron Van Limpit

customer_reviews.title: Rusted within a week!
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly disappointed! We expected to at least get a season out of them. They started to rust within a week. Pictures are from one month after delivery!!! Rust all over!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Turk

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved these chairs. Color is beautiful, very comfortable and the price is right. But I've only had this product for a short while and it's already rusting! It also came with scratches on both arms of both chairs. Pros Comfortable Good price Burgundy color beautiful Comes with cup holder/phone and book holder Easy to use Cons Rusts easily Poorly packaged so that it came with scratches Is not a true gravity chair as it doeant go back all the way
customer_reviews.author: S. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Durable Gravity Chair 2 for the price of 1!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are replacing 1 chair - for which I paid the same price at Big Lots a few years ago - and I can’t believe the deal here on Amazon! I’m glad the design for the cup holder was changed to lower on the side, as the old design contributed to the frame coming apart. We’ve been out on the deck quite a bit this Spring and the chairs are holding up great so far!
customer_reviews.author: S Hins

customer_reviews.title: Great price for great chairs
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs! I saw one chair for $68 at the store, and it didn’t come with the convenient side table. Two chair for this price is great. The chair look nice and are very comfortable. I got them in the red and they are gorgeous! The side table holds a drink, phone and magazine or book at the same time. The only con: the chairs do not lie straight and flat . That didn’t bother me at all, but it could be an issue for a sunbathing.
customer_reviews.author: Lily J

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Bought more!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 4. We initially bought them to be used as camping chairs but we love them so much that they are now in our backyard around the pool. We have nice outdoor furniture (couch, lounge chairs, rocking chairs) but everyone prefers these chairs. I wish I bought these last year, I would’ve saved a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Jen M

customer_reviews.title: Won't last 22 days beyond the waranty. DON'T BUY THESE Chairs
customer_reviews.text: As you can see in the photo, these chairs are made with scrap metal and will rust in about 65 days when used outside in the elements. Of course I didn't buy them for them dining room. Contacted support if you call it that and because I am 22 days beyond the warranty "there is nothing we can do". Oh but wait as a courtesy we will give you 15% refund to say that we did something! Chairs are JUNK! and so is your 15% ! PATHETIC and overrated! Buy from somebody else and definitely not this brand
customer_reviews.author: Bob M

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, handy, sturdy enough & nice price!
customer_reviews.text: We had 2 Magellan zero gravity loungers we love, and wanted more but they were unavailable. These were half the price, and while they are definitely more cheaply made, a little less sturdy, and not quite as wide...they are comfortable, handy, and a good substitute for the others! We’ve had them about a month and they are holding up well!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Warmack

customer_reviews.title: Rusted and Broken not even one summer in!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these chairs in the Spring for our pool opening in May. Chairs came on time, good price for 2 we thought, came ready right out of the box.. we used them a few times and all good. About a month in with only a handful of uses, rust appeared on the sides and some of the bolts had popped off and one of the chairs was already broken. Do not recommend. Get something more suited for the pool life- something weather resistant at least which this is not. And something with better quality as these chairs broke down fairly quickly. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: sarah cruz

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE Frame Structure.  Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE Structure!!!! Notice that all the photos on the site show the footrest raised. The reason... When it is in the neutral normal seating position the back is more than straight up and the seat bottom tilts back giving a feeling of being shoved forward. It can only be used as a recliner with the footrest raised. Even then it has an unnatural feel. Very disappointing. I have sat in other brands and didn't realize there could be this MUCH difference. The fabric and metal is good quality but it is poorly designed. Do not recommend. Spend a few pennies more for a quality chair/recliner.
customer_reviews.author: D Allen

customer_reviews.title: Product rusts!
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in the chair! I did indicate chair not chairs. This comes in a 2 pack. One is fine, and performs as expected. The second chair is rusting and staining my lanai. It has only been in use for 40 days. Something went wrong! I am hopeful that the seller steps up and provides for a return and replacement. Respectively submitted
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Folding chairs for deck
customer_reviews.text: I bought these lounge chairs to use on our deck during the quarantine. The product came fast, is easy to assemble, and is great to relax back on our deck. My favorite feature is that you can adjust the amount you recline. I also love the side tray that allows for a spot for my phone, tablet, and two drinks. I am docking this product 1 star because I noticed the chairs become rusted/turn orange in certain areas after 1 rainfall. The orange rust also stained our deck. From now on, I am going to try to move the chairs into a dry area the next time it rains.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Paradiso

customer_reviews.title: Great photo, but a very cheap product
customer_reviews.text: The chairs were delivered on time and were exactly as described. No setup needed. However, both of the chairs' threading in the sides broke within 6 months. The cup holders broke easy as well. We even bought extra cords at the store to lace through and that didn't work. Such a disappointment. They looked great online and were a good idea and exactly what we were looking for. But the product is not worth the money, especially when they only last 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: J C

customer_reviews.title: Garbage!!!! Rust! Do NOT buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Garbage!!! I have had these for about a month. After the first week they began to rust in the joints. They were never left out in the rain. The only moisture was late night dew from a late party and they rust. Seriously don’t buy these. Customer service sucks too. They never got back to me. Do you research and buy a better brand. UPDATE 7/14. I sent photos to customer service and never heard back. Do NOT buy these. Again, humidity causes these to rust. So unless you are keeping them inside your attic, they’ll rust.
customer_reviews.author: Jason G.

customer_reviews.title: Sit Up And Take Notice
customer_reviews.text: NO ASSEMBLY REQUIRED, unless you count popping on side tray, lol. Chairs are VERY comfortable, feels very sturdy and have ability to lock into any position. Quality for price is extremely good, no frays, no defects on either chair. We are more than happy with these chairs and they’re easily portable too. We were looking to buy Adirondack style chairs but for the price of two of these we could only have bought about 1/2 of even a plastic Adirondack chair, soooooo easy sell.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Ljunggren

customer_reviews.title: Rusting after 30 days...
customer_reviews.text: I normally like these types of chairs, but when I received them, I noticed the quality was a bit less than expected. I had planned to use them in a covered porch area, but in just a few days, I noticed spots of rust appearing everywhere. After 30 days, even the grommets on the canvas portion had spots of rust. Now when you sit in these chairs, you get rust stains on your clothes. Really disappointing...
customer_reviews.author: rcconroy

customer_reviews.title: Great product for $ & great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: One of the 2 chairs arrived soiled and with a burn mark on handle, however amazon quickly sent replacement. These are very easy to adjust and are light weight, making them easy to set up, move around, and to store. They are comfortable, however I wish they had a higher seat, i.e., not so close to ground, and wish they would extend to completely flat recline.
customer_reviews.author: ctr1

customer_reviews.title: Seats deteriorating  :(
customer_reviews.text: Loved these when we first used them at our summer place in Wyoming starting in June. Comfortable and light enough to move around. They have been under our gazebo NEVER sitting in the sun. Husband weighs 175 lbs I weigh 120 lbs.... So with only 4 months use the seat areas are pulling apart. I am NOT HAPPY
customer_reviews.author: bernice

customer_reviews.title: NOT HANDLED WITH ANY CARE!!
customer_reviews.text: Well, to begin with these came in an EXTREMELY DAMAGED BOX, and WAS NOT the product that was damaged on it's own, You can tell how these BEAUTIFUL chair's were tossed around and no telling how they got tweaked, but can TRULY believe it was the way the box was handled and twisted and, no telling what had been piled on top of them, very sad:( because a very nice product (I am sure), if handled much much better and only thin bubble wrap, wrapped around the chair's and placed in the box, THAT'S IT!!
customer_reviews.author: debsstuff

customer_reviews.title: Love the chairs but the after a months use
customer_reviews.text: Love the chairs but the after a months use , screws and nuts coming off arms. Need replacement hardware.
customer_reviews.author: steve bender

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome chairs. Well built
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome chairs. Extremely comfortable!! Ordered another set for my son. I don’t understand all the haters. These are sturdy, well built and you could sleep in these! Love them and highly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: * update* Rusted
customer_reviews.text: * Update from original review. Once I contacted the sellers they did respond to me in a timely manner and offered a 15% refund due to the rust on the chairs. They were all sold out so they could not offer full replacements. I like the comfort of these chairs and they are great for outside, just hate that they started to rust. * I loved these chairs when I first got them but after only a week of having them outside, they are rusted. I'm disappointed because I emailed the sellers.
customer_reviews.author: ashley Bane

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.!
customer_reviews.text: While the chair comfort etc is good, I was a bit disappointed in two things. - The lock feature does not work very effectively and you have to really tighten the screw for it to stay in its place. I could manage to tighten it, my wife couldn't. Interestingly, one chair worked better than the other, so it could be a manufacturing defect. - Both chairs had rust on the handlebars near the screws. Not sure if the build quality is just poor or they were a used set returned by another customer.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Panda

customer_reviews.title: They are cheap but not that great
customer_reviews.text: There are some things to like about these zero gravity chairs. They have the handy little side tray that snaps on. The price is pretty good. They were really adequate at the beginning. Over time, the fabric sags a bit and your butt rests on a crossbar which is uncomfortable. If left in the rain, the chairs develop rust. If you move them, they drain rusty water on your clean concrete and shoes. The knobs that tighten the chair stop working so well. Overall I think its better to buy the higher quality ones.
customer_reviews.author: Just Trying to Help

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy for us and our guests. My husband has had numerous back and neck surgeries and the chair is comfortable for him ( 6' 3" - 205lbs), his sister, who also has neck issues and brother-in-law whose had back surgery. I bought 2 in the navy color last year, but didn't get a chance to really try them out, but this year they've been proven to be comfortable and a good choice when wet from the pool so I bought two more in the turquoise color. Very nice looking and hopefully will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs appear to be very well made, sturdy and easy to use. The box arrived mangled but the chairs were well wrapped and undamaged. I'm not finding any of the problems that have been in other reviews...yet. it makes me wonder if different chairs are coming from different suppliers. I may have lucked out. I will come back and update if anything goes wrong. If you don't hear from me again within a couple of months, I have ordered another set for my other house.
customer_reviews.author: Cape Coddess

customer_reviews.title: It will tear your pockets!  Doesn't last long. Keep looking.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two a few months ago. We have used them approximately 20 days of actual use. The rest of the time they have been folded up against the wall inside of my garage. There are two hinges connecting the lower portion, they will catch your pockets when you are sitting down. The fabric material on them has started failing as of a few weeks ago. I am very surprised at the quick failure with such limited use. I have owned several other chairs like this, they all lasted 2+ years and they only cost about $25 more.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lounge chair that I can use to sit in the back patio. Because of the coronavirus, I felt a bit trapped inside the out. Sitting outside felt a lot better, and I have to say these chair were exactly what I needed. I spend my afternoon sitting outside. These chair are comfortable very comfortable. I fallen asleep in in a few times. It’s very easy fold and unfold. It’s also light weight so moving it around is easy too.
customer_reviews.author: S.P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice chairs but rust easily
customer_reviews.text: Chairs are nice. Look good and comfortable. Tray that clips on is really nice and functional. I really want to give this 5 stars but both chairs started showing rust spots. Not sorry I bought them just wish I would’ve known so I could’ve taken steps to prevent. These are outdoor chairs so was a little disappointing
customer_reviews.author: bella

customer_reviews.title: It’s very difficult to get into these chairs.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure why but it’s so difficult to sit down on these chairs. Perhaps it’s bar that sits on the floor in front on the chair. You would normally walk up to a chair and sit down. With this chair it’s impossible to do so you have to straddle the bar which puts your feet on either side of the front of the chair. Now you are too far away to sit! so you kind of fall back into it. Once in the chair it is comfortable but getting there is hard.
customer_reviews.author: Sooz

customer_reviews.title: Lacking quality
customer_reviews.text: These chairs were very comfortable, while the lasted. Recieved on June 11th and ive already had to take apart and fix one and the other didnt not survive our camping trip over the weekend. Went completely flat the the ground with my boyfriend sitting in it. The other one flipped over with his son in it (7 years old) and i had to disassemble the arms and reassemble for the chair to function properly agian. Thought we were splurging getting ourselves something nice, ended up very disappointed. Would not recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

product_meta.title: Best Choice Products Set of 2 Adjustable Steel Mesh Zero Gravity Lounge Chair Recliners w/Pillows and Cup Holder Trays, Black
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackThese zero gravity chairs are out of this world! With an innovative craftsmanship meant to emulate the weightlessness experienced in space, these folding chairs break the mold and provide maximum comfort with mesh seating that adjusts to your body. Whether you're enjoying the sun and surf or camping in the wilderness, these chairs are made to fit your lifestyle.

Specifications:
Open Dimensions: 32.5"-61"(L) x 25"(W) x 33.5"-44"(H)
Folded Dimensions: 38"(L) x 25"(W) x 6"(H)
Pillow: 14"(L) x 2"(W) x 7"(H)
Weight Capacity: 250 lbs.
Weight: 16.3 lbs. (each)
Colors: Black, Gray, Beige, Burgundy, Brown, Blue, Aqua Blue
Material: Steel, Mesh
No assembly required

Package Includes:
(2) Zero gravity chairs with cup holder trays
feature_bullets: LOCKABLE RECLINING SYSTEM: Smoothly glides into an ergonomic zero-gravity position, with removable elastic cords that immediately adjust to your body's weight
PORTABLE DESIGN: Lightweight, foldable design makes these an easy addition to your next trip to the park, beach, or your child's next sporting event
CONVENIENT & DETACHABLE TRAY: Removable tray is built with two cup holders, a phone holder, and a tablet holder so you never have to be far from your favorite drinks or media devices!
DURABLE & UV-RESISTANT: Features a high, 250 pound weight capacity with flexible, UV-resistant textilene fabric for lasting quality!

REMOVABLE, ADJUSTABLE HEADRESTS: Includes a removable, padded headrest for an extra element of adjustable comfort; OPEN DIMENSIONS: 32.5"-61"(L) x 25"(W) x 33.5"-44"(H); FOLDED DIMENSIONS: 38"(L) x 25"(W) x 6"(H)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars10,867 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
